name: Surprise! (Chris North)
description:
Controls 

WASD - move

Left mouse click - interact

Escape - quit

**Updated so the win screen actually activates

It's your friend's birthday and your task is to get everyone prepared to surprise her when she comes home. Can you complete all the tasks before she arrives?

This game was created with Natasha Kokolakis in 15 days for the Unexpected Jam.
